dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: I just... I don't get it, like, why do we even have a transport tax? Isn't owning a car expensive enough?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: I just... I don't get it, like, why do we even have a transport tax? Isn't owning a car expensive enough?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Well, um, that's a whole other debate, A, but for now, the more immediate concern is, uh, the deadline. It's coming up really fast.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Well, um, that's a whole other debate, A, but for now, the more immediate concern is, uh, the deadline. It's coming up really fast.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Deadline? For what? Again? I swear, I just paid something.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Deadline? For what? Again? I swear, I just paid something.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: For the 2024 transport tax. Almaty's Department of State Revenues just reminded everyone. You've only got, like, seven working days left.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: For the twenty twenty four transport tax. Almaty's Department of State Revenues just reminded everyone. You've only got, like, seven working days left.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Казахстанцам напомнили о сроках уплаты налога на транспорт за 2024 год. До конца срока уплаты осталось 7 рабочих дней. Об этом сообщили в Департаменте государственных доходов Алматы.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Seven days? Wait, so if I don't pay by then... what even happens? Is it, like, just a small fine?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Seven days? Wait, so if I don't pay by then... what even happens? Is it, like, just a small fine?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: No, uh, it's not a small fine. After April 1st, they start charging a penalty for each day it's delayed.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: No, uh, it's not a small fine. After April first, they start charging a penalty for each day it's delayed.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Отмечается, что после 1 апреля за каждый день просрочки будет начисляться пеня.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Okay, okay, but how do I even know how much I owe? Like, do I just guess?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Okay, okay, but how do I even know how much I owe? Like, do I just guess?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: No, not at all. You can use the e-Salyq Azamat mobile app, um, or check the official State Revenue Committee website. They actually started sending push notifications too, since March 15th, with a preliminary calculation.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: No, not at all. You can use the e-Salyq Azamat mobile app, um, or check the official State Revenue Committee website. They actually started sending push notifications too, since March fifteenth, with a preliminary calculation.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Рассчитать сумму налога можно самостоятельно через мобильное приложение e-Salyq Azamat или на официальном сайте Комитета государственных доходов. Начиная с 15 марта автовладельцам начали приходить push-уведомления с предварительным расчетом суммы, которую можно оплатить через банковские приложения или Казпочту.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Push notifications? Huh. I probably just swiped it away then. So, if I don't pay this, like, seriously, what's the worst that could happen?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Push notifications? Huh. I probably just swiped it away then. So, if I don't pay this, like, seriously, what's the worst that could happen?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Well, they'll, uh, start a collection procedure. That means debt notifications, collection orders, then it goes to private bailiffs.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Well, they'll, uh, start a collection procedure. That means debt notifications, collection orders, then it goes to private bailiffs.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Если налог не уплачен вовремя, налоговые органы начнут процедуру взыскания. Это включает в себя уведомления о задолженности, вынесение приказов о взыскании и передачу их частным судебным исполнителям.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Bailiffs? That sounds, um, pretty intense for a car tax.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Bailiffs? That sounds, um, pretty intense for a car tax.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: It really is. Bailiffs can, uh, seize your property, freeze bank accounts. They can even prohibit you from traveling abroad.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: It really is. Bailiffs can, uh, seize your property, freeze bank accounts. They can even prohibit you from traveling abroad.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: В свою очередь, судебные исполнители могут наложить арест на имущество и банковские счета должника и запретить выезд за границу.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Woah, really? No travel? That's... extreme.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Woah, really? No travel? That's... extreme.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: And it gets worse. They can restrict your access to banking services. You wouldn't be able to open an account, transfer money, or even apply for a loan.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And it gets worse. They can restrict your access to banking services. You wouldn't be able to open an account, transfer money, or even apply for a loan.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Также возможно ограничение доступа к банковским услугам: нельзя будет открыть счет, провести денежный перевод или оформить кредит.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Okay, okay, I get it. That's, um, way more serious than I thought. So, like, I better get on that app then.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Okay, okay, I get it. That's, um, way more serious than I thought. So, like, I better get on that app then.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Definitely. And if you have questions about the calculation, just, you know, contact your local state revenue department.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Definitely. And if you have questions about the calculation, just, you know, contact your local state revenue department.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: При возникновении вопросов по расчету налога на транспорт гражданам советуют обращаться в управление государственных доходов по месту жительства.
